instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-3435 Mac Air Fan replacement part number?
threads.message: I have a mid 2013 MacAir 11".   My fan is starting to act spotty and after I recently replaced my IO board I noticed the ribbon cable doesn't seem to seat fully.    I want to order a replacement to have on hand as a backup.    Help with the part number please?   Thx

threads.title: 820-3435 Mac Air Fan replacement part number?
threads.message:
You should search by part, machine model and year...
A1465 2013 fan, for example...
